001package net.tvburger.jdl.linalg;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.numbers.NumberTypeAgnostic;
004
005public interface Vector<N extends Number> extends Transposable<Vector<N>>, NumberTypeAgnostic<N> {
006
007    int getDimensions();
008
009    default boolean isRowVector() {
010        return !isColumnVector();
011    }
012
013    boolean isColumnVector();
014
015    Matrix<N> asMatrix();
016
017    N[] asArray();
018
019    N get(int i);
020
021    Vector<N> multiply(N value);
022
023    Vector<N> add(N value);
024
025    Vector<N> substract(N value);
026
027    Vector<N> add(Vector<N> vector);
028
029    Vector<N> substract(Vector<N> vector);
030
031    N dotProduct(Vector<N> vector);
032
033    N norm();
034
035    @Override
036    int hashCode();
037
038    @Override
039    boolean equals(Object obj);
040
041    default void print() {
042        print(null);
043    }
044
045    default void print(String name) {
046        asMatrix().print(name);
047    }
048}
